scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: eslint . --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && echo '✔  Your .js files look good.' && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && htmlhint -c ./.htmlhintrc views/**/**/**/**/**/**/*.ejs && echo '✔  Your .ejs files look good.' && lesshint assets/styles/ --max-warnings=0 && echo '✔  Your .less files look good.'
scripts.custom-tests: echo "(No other custom tests yet.)" && echo
